Mathematics for ML.Linear Algebra.Matrices.Inverse (Ma trận nghịch đảo/khả nghịch)
content: Unfortunately, not every matrix A possesses an inverse. If this inverse does exist, A is called regular/invertible/nonsingular, otherwise singular/noninvertible. When the matrix inverse exists, it is unique.
